customerReadGLDimensions V20_1

]]> The operation reads basic customer data. Error codes:
68 - User not authorized for account
69 - User not authorized
207 - Customer number must be numeric
209 - Account number must be numeric
1000 - Customer not found
1002 - Not a valid customer number
1003 - Not a valid account number
1009 - Security violation; invalid bank number
2322 - Data for retail customer not found
2323 - Data for corporate customer not found
2390 - Either customerNumber or accountNumber must be present.
2661 - In-Cust-No cannot be longer than the maximum length for the country.]]> The operation reads customer id or customer number. Returns customer information. <br> Error codes: <br> 207 - Customer number must be numeric <br> 3065 - Customer not found. <br> 2661 - In-Cust-No cannot be longer than the maximum length for the country. The operation reads customer tags. Returns customer tags. <br> Error codes: <br> 1000 - Customer not found <br> 2661 - In-Cust-No cannot be longer than the maximum length for the country. The operation reads customer advisor data. Returns customer advisor information. <br> Error codes: <br> 1002 - Customer number is not CDV-valid <br> 1010 - Customer number is wrong <br> 2661 - In-Cust-No cannot be longer than the maximum length for the country.<br> 2681 - Invalid value in AML-Status. The operation reads details customer data. Returns customer information. <br> Error codes: <br> 1002 - Customer number is not CDV-valid <br> 1010 - Customer number is wrong <br> 2661 - In-Cust-No cannot be longer than the maximum length for the country. The operation reads the possible GL dimensions registered in iHub Customer for a customer. Error codes: <br> 208 - Customer id must be numeric <br> 1000 - Customer not found <br> 2661 - In-Cust-No cannot be longer than the maximum length for the country. This operation searches customer. Error codes:
1002 - Customer number is not CDV-valid
1010 - Customer number is wrong
2125 - Too many occurrences. Search parameters should be more precise.
2123 - Invalid Search.
2126 - Invalid date
2661 - In-Cust-No cannot be longer than the maximum length for the country.]]> The operation lists customer data. Returns customer information. <br> Error codes: <br> 2125 - Too many occurences. Search parameters should be more precise. <br> 2661 - In-Cust-No cannot be longer than the maximum length for the country. The operation updates a customer. Error codes:
2316 - Country code not found
2352 - IndustryCode not found or does not belong to specified SectorCode
2319 - Sector code not found
2405 - Language code doesn't exist.
2510 - Lastname has an invalid value
2511 - CorporateName has an invalid value
2489 - Birthdate has an invalid value
2508 - Gender has an invalid value
2300 - SectorCode has an invalid value
2491 - No employees has access to the given viplabel

2521 - Corporate information can not be registered for retail customers
2497 - Business registration number already exists as a sepatate customer
2498 - Business registration number can not be set on this customer type
2522 - Retail information can not be registered for corporate customers
2352 - IndustryCode not found or does not belong to specified SectorCode
2407 - Sector code is not valid according to customer number
2354 - CorporateForm has an invalid value
2500 - Viplabel is not possible for this customer
2501 - Viplabel is not possible for corporate customers
2303 - Sector code is not valid according to customer type.
2299 - Invalid Customer number
2492 - The given ProfitCenter is only valid for mortgage companies.
2494 - The given customerid is not reserved.
2455 - ProfitCenter not found within OrgId.
2353 - Invalid BussinessRegistrationNumber value
2342 - Invalid Weighting category
2340 - Invalid Rating value
2343 - Invalid Risk weighting
2341 - Rating and Credit values does not correspond
2512 - Invalid value in Number of children
2509 - Invalid CreditRate code
2524 - The update will be performed in batch at EndOfDay.
2639 - Current AML status can only be updated by bank employee.
2640 - User not allowed to update national register (DSF) item.
2661 - In-Cust-No cannot be longer than the maximum length for the country

]]> Valid updates are:
- From fictitious for retail customers to a legal person number.
- From fictitious for corporate customers to a business registration number (00800000000 - 00999999999).
- From fictitious to fictitious valid for the customer type.
- From D-number to a legal person number.
- From old type to new type for business registration numbers.
2661 - In-Cust-No cannot be longer than the maximum length for the country]]> Error codes:
2503 - Business registration number can only be changed to the new series.
2504 - This change from old to new customer number is against the rules.
2499 - Customer number is not valid according to customer type.
2407 - Sector code is not valid according to customer number.
2505 - New customer number already exists.
2496 - New customer number exists as a business registration number on another customer.
2661 - In-Cust-No cannot be longer than the maximum length for the country]]> This operation updates customer profit center. Error codes :
2401 - Same values as the base - no change is made.
2429 - No change field is filled in.
2592 - The profit center is not valid.
2646 - ProfitCenter can not be changed when changeProfitCenter is false.

1000 - Customer not found.

2670-Illegal SectorCode value.

]]> This operation validates whether customer exists or not. Returns the result of customer exist validation. Error codes : This operation validates whether the customer is legal customer or not. Returns empty response after successfully validating the customer whether he is legal customer or not. This operation deletes customer entry. Returns empty response after successfully deleting the customer. <br> Error codes : <br> 2591 - Customer is not a potential customer and can not be deleted <br> 2661 - In-Cust-No cannot be longer than the maximum length for the country This operation reads customer's default details. Returns customer's default details. This operation lists customer's direct parameter values. Returns the response of customer direct parameter value list operation This operation gets internal id of a customer Returns internal id of a customer Common type definitions. 1 CHAR length string 2 CHAR length string 3 CHAR length string 4 CHAR length string 5 CHAR length string 6 CHAR length string 7 CHAR length string 8 CHAR length string 9 CHAR length string 10 CHAR length string 11 CHAR length string 12 CHAR length string 13 CHAR length string 15 CHAR length string 16 CHAR length string 17 CHAR length string 18 CHAR length string 19 CHAR length string 20 CHAR length string 21 CHAR length string 22 CHAR length string 23 CHAR length string 24 CHAR length string 25 CHAR length string 26 CHAR length string 27 CHAR length string 30 CHAR length string 32 CHAR length string 34 CHAR length string 35 CHAR length string 36 CHAR length string 40 CHAR length string 42 CHAR length string 50 CHAR length string 60 CHAR length string 70 CHAR length string 78 CHAR length string 80 CHAR length string 100 CHAR length string 120 CHAR length string 140 CHAR length string 150 CHAR length string 200 CHAR length string 220 CHAR length string 240 CHAR length string 250 CHAR length string 255 CHAR length string 256 CHAR length string 400 CHAR length string 500 CHAR length string Integer value with max length 1 Integer value with max length 2 Integer value with max length 3 Integer value with max length 4 Integer value with max length 5 Integer value with max length 6 Integer value with max length 7 Integer value with max length 8 Integer value with max length 9 Long value with max length 9. Long value with max length 10 Long value with max length 11 Long value with max length 12 Long value with max length 13 Long value with max length 16 Long value with max length 18 IBAN number - International Bank Account Number, comprising a country code, two check digits and a basic bank account-number (BBAN), eg. NO5928012192284. Norwegian account number Norwegian customer number Reg bank number Customer internal id User id Numeric customer internal id Decimal value of max length 18 with 3 decimals Decimal value of max length 9 with 5 decimals Internal generated id Product number Sequence number. URL Ratio Alphanumeric value with length 5 Permitted values:'PC' - Profit Centers;'OU' - Organization Units Month 1-12 Positive(>0) integer value with max length 11 Executive officer identification Executive officer name Short name of customer Product identification Product short name - 6 characters Product sequence number Product name Product internal id Profit center id Profit center text Sets the alias that identifies the self service channel agreement. Either use value from numeric alias (for cash call channel) or alphanumeric alias (for internet bank, mobile bank, sms bank channel). Sets the self service channel. Valid values: WAP - Mobile bank channel agreement. INT - Internet bank channel agreement. SMS - Sms bank channel agreement. TLF - Cash call channel agreement. Currency code (ISO 4217) Interest calculation factor. Interest calculation divisor. Application calling a service. CustomerKey can be supplied by either the customer's internal id or as the customer's customer number. The customer internal id. The customer number. CustomerKey can be supplied by either the customer's internal id or as the customer's customer number. The international customer internal id. The international customer number. The product key consists of either (productNumber and sequenceNumber) OR productId. Product key alternative 1 consists of product number and product sequence number. Product key alternative 2 consists of product id only. Product key alternative 1 consists of the product number and the product sequence number. The product number. The product sequence number. Product key alternative 2 consists of the product id only. The product id. SelfServiceKey consist of alias and channel, and identifies a self service channel agreement. Both values must be set. Sets the alias that identifies the self service channel agreement.<br> Either use value from numeric alias (for cash call channel) or alphanumeric alias (for internet bank, mobile bank, sms bank channel). Sets the self service channel.<br> Valid values:<br> WAP - Mobile bank channel agreement.<br> INT - Internet bank channel agreement.<br> SMS - Sms bank channel agreement.<br> TLF - Cash call channel agreement. Numeric alias - which allows on all numerics as password and min and max is 11 digits. Numeric password for cash call. Password for internet bank. ISO 9362 SWIFT address. <br> 4 characters: bank code (letters only) <br> 2 characters: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (letters only) <br> 2 characters: location code (letters and numbers) (if second charcter is "1", the receiver is a passive participant of the SWIFT network) <br> 3 characters: department code, optional ('XXX' for headquarters) (letters and numbers) The account number input as BBAN or IBAN format. Basic Bank Account Number, where format is decided by the national central bank or designated payment authority of each country, eg. 12345678901 International Bank Account Number, comprising a country code, two check digits and a bank account-number (BBAN), eg. XX9912345678901 The account number Output as BBAN and IBAN format. Basic Bank Account Number, where format is decided by the national central bank or designated payment authority of each country, eg. 12345678901 International Bank Account Number, comprising a country code, two check digits and a bank account-number (BBAN), eg. XX9912345678901 Unknown value Valid values: UNKNOWN Unknown host value Decimal value of max length 5 with 2 decimals Identifies the person who initiated the action This could either be the customer itself in a netbank) or an employee Authorization data. This is typically a security Object retriewed from a logon, but can also be a plain password. Indicated what type of application that initiated the request The OrganizationalId - will in a banking context be Financial Institution / Konsernnr The Organizational unit will in a banking context be Branch / Registernr Id of the customer on which the operation is requested, may be the same as userid, but may well be different Locale in a java syntax e.g "en_EN". May be used if application supports localized response The ip adress of the client Optionnal extention items - Add key/value pairs for application specific extentions Identifies the source that initiated the message. Used to separate different service consumers. Identifies the destination of the message. Used to separate different service providers. Identifies the service to be called. Service version "X.Y.Z" according to this standard: X = Main release (major changes, not necessarily backwards compatible) Y = Minor release (backwards compatible, new functionality) Z = Bugfix (backwards compatible, error correction only) Elements for identifying client context information. Numeric error code reported for this error. Response Status Severity Code Unique code identifying the component returning the service response Message describing the error. Default is english language. Optionally localized according to the locale parameter in the service request Optional key generated to be used for log correlation purposes. Optional extention items - key/value pairs are used for extented error inforamtion. Common type definitions. Generic SoapFault type Contains the distinct error-code and additional information on the actual error. An type capable of describing a segments length or wished length Index of segment start Describes a paging segment Describes the returned segment Number of elements returned Wraps paging and data elements Generated primary key in database Version counter field used for optimistic locking See: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Optimistic_concurrency_control This ensures data consistency when data travels across layers. Bearer of the primary key. Not present for an non-persisted entity. The optimistic locking version field. Not present for an non-persisted entity. Base response type which all services should extend off The response state which describes the outcome of calling the service. Official/legal customer number, f.ex. Social security number. Norwegian format the date an occurrence was created in the database the time an occurrence was created in the database True: there are more occurrences than in the result list False: there are not more occurrences last occurrency is delivered in the result list Open date of an occurrence, f.ex. the date when the customer became a customer and not the date the customer was registered in the database The date the customer was last changed. The time the customer was last changed. Refers to the name of who first time made this record User that last changed the occurrence. ISO 9362 SWIFT address.<br> 4 characters: bank code (letters only)<br> 2 characters: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (letters only) <br> 2 characters: location code (letters and numbers) (if second charcter is "1", the receiver is a passive participant of the SWIFT network)<br> 3 characters: department code, optional ('XXX' for headquarters) (letters and numbers) Restricted entities in the customer information domain. Unknown value<br> Valid values:<br> UNKNOWN Unknown host value CustomerType<br> Valid values: <br> RETAIL Retail customer <br> CORPORATE Corporate customer <br> SELF_EMPLOYD Both/self employed customer Language code<br> Valid values: <br> NOB Norwegian bokml<br> NNO Norwegian nynorsk <br> Credit rate code<br> Valid values: <br> GOOD Good customer <br> FAIR Fairly good customer <br> LESS Less good customer <br> BAD No good customer Executive officer type <br> Valid values: <br> EXEC_OFF Executive officer/customer responsible <br> CUST_SEG Customer segment <br> CONTACT Contact person for customer group Attribute type code<br> Valid values: <br> RATING Rating <br> CREDIT Credit quality tier <br> WEIGHTING Weighting category <br> RISK Risk weighting Valid values:
NO Not controlled
SIMPLIFIED Simplified control
STANDARD Standard control
ENHANCED Enhanced control
STANDARDPLUS Standard plus control]]> Relation share code<br> Valid values: <br> FULL Full time <br> PART Part time Customer group connection code<br> Valid values: <br> MANUAL Manual Customer group connection code<br> Valid values: <br> MANUAL Manual <br> AUTOMATIC Automatic UNKNOWN Unknown host value Archive document type. <br> Valid values:<br> PEP Political Exposed Person document<br> CORP_CUST Corporate market customer messages <br> ACCT_AGR Customer account agreements <br> PROOF_ID Proof of identity Archive document group type. <br> Valid values:<br> CUSTB Customer document bank employee Archive type. <br> Valid values: CONTENT_MGR Content manager <br> PROOF_ID Proof of identity from archive National codes type. <br> Valid values:<br> DSTRC District/geographical/municipal code <br> SECTO Sector code <br> INDST Industrial code/business code <br> SECOW Sector code of owner Sector owner code<br> Valid values: <br> NO No sector owner <br> ASSOCIATED Associated company, meaning the bank owns a certain percentage of the company <br> SUBSIDIARY Subsidiary company, meaning a company controlled by a holding company Entities in the customer domain. Unknown value. <br> Valid values: Description: <br> UNKNOWN Unknown host value. <br> Does the customer have any of the agreement types ? <br> Host value: Enum value: Description: <br> '000' HAS_ACCOUNT_AGREEMENT The customer has RK,UL,VR or GA account agreements. <br> '010' HAS_AUTH_AGREEMENT The Customer has a KE_Autent agreement. <br> '020' HAS_CARD_AGREEMENT The Customer has a Card agreement. All other values UNKNOWN Host value: Enum value: Description: 'A' A_POSTAGE Postal priority A if not overruled in distribution system. <br> 'B' B_POSTAGE Postal priority B if not overruled in distribution system. Language code <br> Valid values: Description: <br> NOB Norwegian bokml (host vale "B") <br> NNO Norwegian nynorsk (host vale "N") Host value: Enum value: Description: <br> 'B' STD_NORWEGIAN Norwegian language 'bokml' is preferred. <br> 'N' NEW_NORWEGIAN Norwegian language 'nynorsk' is preferred. <br> All other values UNKNOWN Enum value: Description: <br> GOOD Good customer (host vale "0"). <br> FAIR Fairly good customer (host vale "1"). <br> LESS Less good customer (host vale "2"). <br> BAD No good customer (host vale "3"). Attribute type code. <br> Valid values: Description: <br> RATING Rating (host vale "RATIN") <br> CREDIT Credit quality tier (host vale "KRETR") <br> WEIGHTING Weighting category (host vale "VEKAT") <br> RISK Risk weighting (host vale "RISVE") Sector owner code tells which relation the customer has to the bank. <br> Valid values: Description: <br> NO No sector owner <br> ASSOCIATED Associated company, meaning the bank owns a certain percentage of the company <br> SUBSIDIARY Subsidiary company, meaning a company controlled by a holding company Sets mail priority. <br> Valid values: Description: <br> A First priority mail <br> B Second priority mail Defines type of customer. <br> Valid values: Description: <br> RETAIL Retail customer (host vale "P") <br> CORPORATE Corporate customer (host vale "N") Contains income specific information. Yearly income amount. Income year. Valid values: Description:
NOT_CHECKED Not checked
OLD_JURIDICAL Approved as juridical before current AML check
APPROVED Approved
REJECTED Rejected manually
RISK_APPROVED Risk check passed
NAME_APPROVED Name check passed
IN_PROCESS AML checking in process
NAMELIST_HIT Name list hit]]> Debit Collection Code Valid values: <br> NODEBTCOLLECTION No debt collection(account not in arrears) <br> TRANSFEREDTODEBTCOLLECTOR Loan sent to debt collection <br> TRANSFERTODEBTCOLLECTOR Loan sent to debt collection automatically. <br> NOTRANSFERTODEBTCOLLECTOR Bank has decided that this loan is not to be sent to debt collection for now. <br> TRANSFERAUTOMATICTODEBTCOLLECTOR Loan sent to debt collection automatically. Only possible in the periode fra 41 days to 55 days after arrears first occurred. Customer details. <br> Some commonCustomerInformation items are mandatory, but additional retail or corporate customer information depends on what customer type in question. <br> Retail customers will have retail customer data, corporate customers will have corporate customer data and self employed customers can have both. <br> Minimum requirements are at least two characters in lastName or corporateName. The group contains items concerning consent information about the customer. Group containing attribute information for the customer. Group containing attribute information for the customer. Attribute type code. <br> Valid values: <br> RATING Rating (host vale "RATIN") <br> CREDIT Credit quality tier (host vale "KRETR") <br> WEIGHTING Weighting category (host vale "VEKAT") <br> RISK Risk weighting (host vale "RISVE") When attribute-type is "RATING", valid values are "ECA" and "ECAI".
When attribute-type "CREDIT" can only be filled in if also attribute-type "RATING" is filled in.
- If "RATING" value is "ECA", "RATING" valid values are "0" to "7".
- If "RATING" value is "ECAI", "RATING" valid values are "1" to "6".
When attribute-type is "WEIGHTING", valid value is "SMB".
When attribute-type is "RISK", valid value is "0", "10", "20", "35", "50", "75", "100" and "150".]]> The group contains items concerning consent information about the customer. Tells whether customer wants advertisement or not. <br> True : The customer agrees. <br> False: The customer does not agree. <br> NULL : Unacquainted, data not collected. Valid values:
MARRIED Married
UNMARRIED Unmarried/single
WIDOW_WIDOWER Widow or widower after marriage
REGISTERED_PARTNER Partner or equal sex marriage
COHABITATION Cohabitor

DIVORCED Divorced after marriage or partnership
WIDOW_WIDOWER_PARTNER Widow or widower after registered partner

Typical values of National Register (DSF)
1 Resident. If the customer has a D-number then active

3 Emigtated
4 Disappeared. If the customer has a D-number then not active
5 Dead
6 Expired national identity number

Group containing enum items for common customer type. The ISO-639 Norwegian language code associated with the customer. <br> Valid values: <br> NOB Norwegian bokml <br> NNO Norwegian nynorsk Sector owner code tells which relation the customer has to the bank. <br> Valid values: Description: <br> NO No sector owner <br> ASSOCIATED Associated company, meaning the bank owns a certain percentage of the company <br> SUBSIDIARY Subsidiary company, meaning a company controlled by a holding company Typical values:
'blank' Not controlled
OK Approved (G)
OKX Approved without AML control (X)
ODDU Enhanced due diligence (EDD) needed (U)
ODDF Ongoing due diligence (ODD) needed (F)
EDDU EDD needed after ODD (E)
AVVIS Rejected (A)
EDDAV Rejected after ODD (H)
NVNOK Approved after name check (N)
NVNU EDD needed after name check (V)
IKJOK Approved name and partly risk score (K)
IKJU EDD needed after name and risk score (L)

Returns customer's default details Returns engagement credit Returns engagement debit Returns total amount credit limit Returns customer created date Returns number of active RK accounts Returns number of active UL accounts Returns deposit details of a customer Returns loan details of a customer Returns loan details of a customer Returns loan amount arrears of a customer Valid values: Description
NODEBTCOLLECTION No debt collection(account not in arrears)
TRANSFEREDTODEBTCOLLECTOR Loan sent to debt collection
TRANSFERTODEBTCOLLECTOR Loan sent to debt collection automatically.
NOTRANSFERTODEBTCOLLECTOR Bank has decided that this loan is not to be sent to debt collection for now.
TRANSFERAUTOMATICTODEBTCOLLECTOR Loan sent to debt collection automatically. Only possible in the periode fra 41 days to 55 days after arrears first occurred.
UNKNOWN Unknown host value
